content: #alonetogethersweater totally free pattern published by lærke bagger danish knitwear designer known for her innovative and playful designs this pattern is available on lærke bagger s instagram pages under a series of story highlights found in circles underneath her bio box cut fit with a dropped shoulder yarn is anything you have laying around main yarn should be at least two pieces of similarly colored yarn held together and these pieces can be swapped out at any time as long as the yarn weight stays similar random color design is created by tying pieces of scrap yarn into one of the main yarns as you go technique is shown and described on instagram stories
